name: JoyRide (Evilous)
description:
This is some garbage I made when I got bored. Don't even download it its not worth the time.

It's one of those fake 3d games with a car that I don't know how to make it go the way I want it to. 

There is no point, all it is is a car that flips randomly while driving forward. 

If you want to know how long this took, it took around ten to fifteen minutes and the compile time with writing this up is going to be most of the dev time. I made the music and most of the assets before and they were never going to be used for a reason. 

I should be studying for college tests but this was a good stress release and a good break.
